page.title: 11Burscough-Food and Shopping
page.content: by Rachael My mum does most of the shopping in our house and I sometimes go with her.We usually buy the basic things like bread ,butter,milk and a few things like sweets and crisps.We don't buy any fruit and vegetables as work on a fruit and vegetable stall.We go to a supermarket once per week which is only two miles away.There is plenty of car parking space there. My mother and I both prepare food.A typical meal is potatoes,vegetables and steak.We also eat a lot of fish,salad, chips,cheese,eggs and hamburgers.In our kitchen there is a fan oven and so things cook faster than on recipies.in iwe mainly cook joints of meat.
